Plot: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.
Title: U-571
Writer: Jonathan Mostow (story), Jonathan Mostow (screenplay), Sam Montgomery (screenplay), David Ayer (screenplay)
Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Bill Paxton, Harvey Keitel, Jon Bon Jovi
tomatoConsensus: Excellent cinematography and an interesting plot accompanied by a talented cast and crew make U-571 a tense thriller.
